name: Small Talk (olivieryc, brandon77, kalelovil, Cerisey, NevEagleson, Rlan, ArronGardner, SlimTimSnail)
name_original: Small Talk (olivieryc, brandon77, kalelovil, Cerisey, NevEagleson, Rlan, ArronGardner, SlimTimSnail)
description:
It takes a lot of skill to have adult conversation. How do you answer questions? What does making sense sound like? It becomes easier if you just... keeeep... talking...

When you're nervous, words just appear in your brain and jumble out of your mouth. Play as a bunch of neurons trying to keep the conversation going.

  • Plug in up to 4 controllers
  • Press a button to activate a neuron (player)
  • Use the joystick to move a neuron around the brain space
  • Push useless words away from the mouth
  • Push words that make sense into the mouth
  • Try to keep the conversation going, or don't :)
